<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Object Detection </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Finds the nearest building to a given object or position. A "building" is defined as an object that is of class "House" and contains a path LOD. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''nearestBuilding''' position </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value> 1

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> position: [[Object]] or [[Array]] in format [[PositionAGL]] or [[Position2D]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Object]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value> 1

____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_nBuilding = [[nearestBuilding]] [[player]];</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_nBuilding = [[nearestBuilding]] [[position]] [[player]];</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[buildingPos]], [[nearestObject]], [[nearestObjects]], [[nearObjects]], [[nearestLocation]], [[nearEntities]], [[nearTargets]], [[nearSupplies]], [[nearestLocationWithDubbing]], [[nearObjectsReady]], [[nearRoads]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>

<dd class="notedate">Posted on February 18, 2016 - 20:18 (UTC)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:Pierre MGI|Pierre MGI]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
This command doesn't return any house or building placed in editor (with [[createVehicle]]). Use [[nearestObjects]] instead:
<code>[[nearestObjects]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[[player]], ["House", "Building"], 50] [[select]] 0</code>
</dd>
